full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
===============

**Tender Title:** W6889-240168 Compressed Air Systems Standing Offer
------------------------

**Solicitation Number:** WS4477827551
**Reference Number:** WS4477827551-Doc4477988926
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Publication Date:** March 7, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** March 28, 2024, 14:00 EST (Eastern Standard Time)

**Classifications:**

* Industrial pumps and compressors ( UNSPSC: 40150000)
* Compressors (UNSPSC: 40151600)
* Compressor parts or accessories (UNSPSC: 40151800)
* Compressor assembly (UNSPSC: 44101711)

**Procurement Method:** Competitive – open bidding

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest price

**Trade Agreements:**

* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

**Regions of Opportunity:** None
**Regions of Delivery:** Petawawa

**Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
**Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

**Contact Information:**
Wayne Cook, SPAC/PSPC  
wayne.cook@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca  
**Note:** Contact information is subject to change

**Tender Description:**
Canada intends to award one Standing Offer contract to provide supervision, labour, materials, tools, and equipment required for the inspection, testing, service, and repairs to various compressed air systems at Garrison Petawawa to the Department of National Defence on an as-and-when-required basis. Respondents must submit their required supporting documents and bid submission by March 28, 2024, at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Ariba Discovery Posting Response Deadline:** 14:00 EST on March 28, 2024

Please refrain from including any information
